name: Advertisement Posters
desc: Unlocks a variety of wall-mounted advertisement posters for your C.A.M.P.

name: Artillery
desc: Unlocks the Artillery Piece and Smoke Grenade box for calling in fire support.

name: Backyard Grill
desc: Unlocks a standard outdoor cooking grill for your C.A.M.P.

name: Barbed Harpoon
desc: Unlocks the barbed mod for the Harpoon Gun, adding bleed damage.

name: Barn Building Set
desc: Unlocks the red barn-style walls, roofs, and doors for C.A.M.P. construction.

name: Baseball Player Statue
desc: Unlocks a decorative bronze statue of a baseball player.

name: Bathtub
desc: Unlocks a standard white porcelain bathtub for your C.A.M.P.

name: Bear Arm
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the powerful Bear Arm melee weapon.

name: Bear-Proof Trashcan
desc: Unlocks a heavy-duty, lidded trashcan for your C.A.M.P.

name: Beeswax Candle
desc: Unlocks a C.A.M.P. resource that provides a constant source of Oil.

name: BioCommMesh Metal Armor Lining
desc: Increases chem duration by 50% for Metal Armor torso.

name: BioCommMesh Robot Armor Lining
desc: Increases chem duration by 50% for Robot Armor torso.

name: BoS Combat Armor Chest Piece
desc: Unlocks the BoS mod for Combat Armor chests, providing the highest resistance.

name: Brahmin Pen
desc: Unlocks a fertilizer producer and a tame Brahmin for your C.A.M.P.

name: Broken Toilet
desc: Unlocks a decorative, grimy broken toilet for your C.A.M.P.

name: Canopy Tent
desc: Unlocks a large outdoor tent structure for your C.A.M.P.

name: Chemistry Workbench
desc: Unlocks the crafting station for chems, ammo, and explosives.

name: Cushioned Leather Armor Legs
desc: Reduces falling damage for Leather Armor legs.

name: Cushioned Raider Armor Legs
desc: Reduces falling damage for Raider Armor legs.

name: Cushioned Trapper Armor Legs
desc: Reduces falling damage for Trapper Armor legs.

name: Daisy Rug
desc: Unlocks a decorative circular rug with a daisy flower pattern.

name: Deep Pocketed Combat Armor Chest
desc: Greatly increases carry weight (+20) for Combat Armor torso.

name: Deep Pocketed Leather Armor Chest
desc: Greatly increases carry weight (+20) for Leather Armor torso.

name: Deep Pocketed Raider Armor Limbs
desc: Greatly increases carry weight (+10 per limb) for Raider Armor.

name: Domestic Tables
desc: Unlocks a set of clean wooden indoor tables for your C.A.M.P.

name: Double Display Shelf
desc: Unlocks a two-tiered wooden shelf for displaying items.

name: Electrified Mr. Handy Buzz Blade
desc: Unlocks the electrified mod for the Buzz Blade, adding energy damage.

name: Fasnacht Balloons 01
desc: Decorative colorful balloon clusters for your C.A.M.P.

name: Fasnacht Balloons 02
desc: A second variation of decorative colorful balloon clusters.

name: Fasnacht Branch Garland 01
desc: A festive wall-mounted branch decoration with ornaments.

name: Fasnacht Confetti Pile 01
desc: Unlocks a decorative floor-based pile of colorful confetti.

name: Fasnacht Confetti Pile 02
desc: A second variation of floor confetti piles.

name: Fasnacht Flag Pole 01
desc: A tall, festive flagpole for your C.A.M.P.

name: Fasnacht Flag Pole 02
desc: A second variation of the festive Fasnacht flagpole.

name: Fasnacht Hanging Ribbons 01
desc: Festive ribbons that hang from ceilings or rafters.

name: Fasnacht Hanging Ribbons 02
desc: A second variation of hanging festive ribbons.

name: Fasnacht Hanging Snowflakes 01
desc: Decorative hanging snowflake ornaments.

name: Fasnacht Hanging Snowflakes 02
desc: A second variation of hanging snowflake ornaments.

name: Fasnacht Helvetia Garland 01
desc: A wide festive wall garland featuring Helvetian colors.

name: Fasnacht Helvetia Garland 02
desc: A second variation of the wide festive wall garland.

name: Fasnacht Mounted Flag 01
desc: A wall-mounted festive Fasnacht flag.

name: Fasnacht Mounted Flag 02
desc: A second variation of the wall-mounted festive flag.

name: Fasnacht Mounted Ribbons
desc: Wall-mounted clusters of festive ribbons.

name: Fasnacht Party Streamers 01
desc: Unlocks colorful hanging party streamers.

name: Fasnacht Party Streamers 02
desc: A second variation of hanging party streamers.

name: Fasnacht Pole Lantern 02
desc: A festive lantern on a tall wooden pole.

name: Fasnacht Ribbons Pole 01
desc: A tall pole wrapped in festive ribbons.

name: Fasnacht Ribbons Pole 02
desc: A second variation of the ribbon-wrapped pole.

name: Fasnacht Veggie Man Beer Stein
desc: Unlocks a craftable decorative beer stein featuring the Veggie Man.

name: Flower Box - Ash Rose
desc: A rectangular wooden flower box containing Ash Roses.

name: Flower Box - Aster
desc: A rectangular wooden flower box containing Asters.

name: Flower Box - Mutated Fern
desc: A rectangular wooden flower box containing Mutated Ferns.

name: Flower Box - Rhododendron
desc: A rectangular wooden flower box containing Rhododendrons.

name: Flower Box - Soot Flower
desc: A rectangular wooden flower box containing Soot Flowers.

name: Flowering Box - Ash Rose
desc: A decorative C.A.M.P. box with Ash Roses in bloom.

name: Flowering Box - Aster
desc: A decorative C.A.M.P. box with Asters in bloom.

name: Flowering Box - Mutated Fern
desc: A decorative C.A.M.P. box with Mutated Ferns in bloom.

name: Flowering Box - Rhododendron
desc: A decorative C.A.M.P. box with Rhododendrons in bloom.

name: Flowering Box - Soot Flower
desc: A decorative C.A.M.P. box with Soot Flowers in bloom.

name: Footlocker
desc: Unlocks a military-style footlocker for storage in your C.A.M.P.

name: Fort Steuben Sign
desc: A decorative metal wall sign for Fort Steuben.

name: Gulper Rug
desc: Unlocks a large floor rug made from the hide of a Gulper.

name: Gulper Smacker
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the Gulper Smacker melee weapon.

name: Heavy Metal Torso
desc: Unlocks the crafting of the Heavy variant for Metal Armor chest pieces.

name: Helvetian Flower Display
desc: A decorative arrangement of flowers in a wooden Helvetian stand.

name: Herdsman's Bell - Basic
desc: Unlocks the basic version of the Herdsman's Bell decoration.

name: Herdsman's Bell - Fasnacht
desc: Unlocks the Fasnacht-themed variant of the Herdsman's Bell.

name: Herdsman's Bell - Lincoln
desc: Unlocks the Lincoln variant of the Herdsman's Bell.

name: Horned Shepherd's Crook
desc: Unlocks a horned modification for the Shepherd's Crook.

name: Jitterbug Judy Outfit
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the Jitterbug Judy cosmetic outfit.

name: Jukebox
desc: Unlocks a functional jukebox that plays music in your C.A.M.P.

name: Kitchen Stove
desc: Unlocks a standard cooking station stove for your C.A.M.P.

name: Laser Gun Tuned Beta Wave Tuner
desc: Adds burning damage and improves critical damage for the Laser Gun.

name: Lead Lined Marine Armor Chest
desc: Increases radiation resistance for Marine Armor torso pieces.

name: Lead Lined Metal Armor Chest
desc: Increases radiation resistance for Metal Armor torso pieces.

name: Lead Lined Raider Armor Chest
desc: Increases radiation resistance for Raider Armor torso pieces.

name: Light Boxes
desc: Unlocks modular light blocks that can change colors via power terminals.

name: Light Combat Torso
desc: Unlocks the crafting of standard Light Combat Armor chest pieces.

name: Light Metal Arms
desc: Unlocks the crafting of standard Light Metal Armor arm pieces.

name: Light Metal Torso
desc: Unlocks the crafting of standard Light Metal Armor chest pieces.

name: MIRV Frag Grenade
desc: Unlocks the crafting of the MIRV grenade, which splits into cluster explosives.

name: Megasloth Pelt Rug
desc: A large floor rug made from a Megasloth hide.

name: Metal Diner Doors
desc: Unlocks the classic metal swing doors found in pre-war diners.

name: Metal Shelves
desc: Unlocks a set of industrial metal storage shelves.

name: Metal Signs
desc: Unlocks a variety of small metal signs for wall decoration.

name: Metal Stools
desc: Unlocks a set of metal stools for seating.

name: Milk Vending Machine
desc: A decorative C.A.M.P. item that resembles a pre-war milk vendor.

name: Minigun
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the heavy Minigun weapon.

name: Mole Miner Gauntlet
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the Mole Miner Gauntlet melee weapon.

name: Motorized Butter Churn
desc: A C.A.M.P. resource producer that generates Cooking Oil over time.

name: Mounted Blue Devil Head
desc: Unlocks a wall-mounted trophy head of the Blue Devil cryptid.

name: Mounted Mega Sloth
desc: Unlocks a wall-mounted trophy head of a Mega Sloth.

name: Mounted Radroach
desc: Unlocks a wall-mounted trophy of a Radroach.

name: Mr. Handy Buzz Blade
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the standard Mr. Handy Buzz Blade.

name: Nuka Quantum Grenade
desc: Unlocks the crafting of highly powerful Nuka-Cola Quantum grenades.

name: Nuka-Cola Grenade
desc: Unlocks the crafting of explosive Nuka-Cola grenades.

name: Office Desk
desc: Unlocks a clean pre-war metal office desk for your C.A.M.P.

name: Old Man Winter Effigy
desc: Unlocks a large bonfire effigy that can be lit.

name: Painted Wooden Doors
desc: Unlocks a set of colorful wooden doors for building.

name: Park Grill
desc: Unlocks a public park style charcoal grill cooking station.

name: Pianos
desc: Unlocks various playable pianos that grant an AP refresh buff.

name: Pickaxe
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the pickaxe melee weapon.

name: Pocketed Leather Armor Chest
desc: Increases carry weight (+10) for Leather Armor torso.

name: Pocketed Leather Armor Limbs
desc: Increases carry weight (+5 per limb) for Leather Armor limbs.

name: Pocketed Metal Armor Limbs
desc: Increases carry weight (+5 per limb) for Metal Armor limbs.

name: Pocketed Raider Armor Chest
desc: Increases carry weight (+10) for Raider Armor torso.

name: Pocketed Raider Armor Limbs
desc: Increases carry weight (+5 per limb) for Raider Armor limbs.

name: Potted Plants
desc: Unlocks a variety of small potted indoor plants for decoration.

name: Rug Set 2
desc: Unlocks a second collection of decorative floor rugs.

name: Scorchbeast Queen Beer Stein
desc: Unlocks a craftable beer stein featuring the Scorchbeast Queen.

name: Shadowed Combat Armor Arms
desc: Improves stealth in dark environments for Combat Armor arms.

name: Shadowed Combat Armor Chest
desc: Improves stealth in dark environments for Combat Armor torso.

name: Shadowed Metal Armor Arms
desc: Improves stealth in dark environments for Metal Armor arms.

name: Shadowed Robot Armor Chest
desc: Improves stealth in dark environments for Robot Armor torso.

name: Single-Action Revolver
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the Single-Action Revolver.

name: Single-Action Revolver Ivory Grip
desc: Modifies the Single-Action Revolver with a decorative ivory grip.

name: Spin the Wheel Ornament
desc: A decorative C.A.M.P. ornament based on the Spin the Wheel event.

name: Stone Fountain
desc: Unlocks a large decorative stone water fountain for your C.A.M.P.

name: Strengthened Raider Armor Limbs
desc: Reduces incoming limb damage for Raider Armor limbs.

name: Switchblade Serrated Blade
desc: Adds bleed and armor penetration to the Switchblade.

name: T-51b Chest Piece
desc: Unlocks the crafting of the T-51b Power Armor chest piece.

name: T-51b Motion-Assist Servos
desc: Increases Strength (+2) while wearing T-51b Power Armor.

name: T-60 Jet Pack
desc: Unlocks the Jet Pack modification for the T-60 Power Armor torso.

name: T-60 Motion-Assist Servos
desc: Increases Strength (+2) while wearing T-60 Power Armor.

name: Tesla Rifle
desc: Unlocks the ability to craft the Tesla Rifle energy weapon.

name: Tinker's Workbench
desc: Unlocks the crafting station for ammo, grenades, and quest items.

name: Track Lighting
desc: Unlocks a set of adjustable track lights for your C.A.M.P.

name: Trapper Legs
desc: Unlocks the crafting of standard Trapper Armor leg pieces.

name: Tunnel of Love Snow Globe
desc: A decorative snow globe featuring the Tunnel of Love attraction.

name: Ultra-Light Build Marine Armor Limbs
desc: Greatly reduces weight and increases AP (+5) for Marine Armor.

name: Ultra-Light Build Metal Armor Chest
desc: Greatly reduces weight and increases AP (+5) for Metal Armor torso.

name: Ultra-Light Build Robot Armor Limbs
desc: Greatly reduces weight and increases AP (+5) for Robot Armor.

name: Ultracite Left Arm
desc: Unlocks the crafting of the Ultracite Power Armor left arm.

name: Ultracite Optimized Bracers
desc: Reduces Action Point cost for power attacks in Ultracite Power Armor.

name: Wall Mounted Fan
desc: Unlocks a decorative oscillating wall-mounted fan.

name: Warehouse Building Set
desc: Unlocks industrial corrugated metal walls and doors for building.

name: Wooden Crate
desc: Unlocks a basic wooden storage crate for your C.A.M.P.

name: Wooden Desks
desc: Unlocks a set of simple wooden pre-war desks.

name: Wooden Patio Chair
desc: Unlocks a simple wooden chair designed for outdoor use.

name: Wooden Picnic Table
desc: Unlocks a large wooden picnic table for outdoor seating.

name: Player Title: Masked
desc: Unlocks the 'Masked' prefix/suffix for your player title.

name: Player Title: Mutated
desc: Unlocks the 'Mutated' prefix/suffix for your player title.
